content: be sure to check out our linked youtube tutorial for this pattern language english skill level easy required skills stitches chain slip_stitch single_crochet working in the round sew openings close sew parts together join parts materials soft smooth acrylic worsted weight yarn as well as felt and puffy paint measures 9 on average depending on how tight you crochet © codi hudnall all rights reserved you may use this pattern for personal use as gifts or for charity but you are not permitted to sell this pattern or the finished item for financial gain if you have any questions or problems regarding this pattern or you find any errors please feel free to email me at knitgrithelp@gmail com
